testcase.name: Rejects XSS payload: <script>alert("xss")</script>...

testcase.classname: Security - SQL Injection Prevention XSS prevention in inputs
testcase.name: Rejects XSS payload: ...

testcase.classname: Security - SQL Injection Prevention XSS prevention in inputs
testcase.name: Rejects XSS payload: "><svg onload=alert(1)>...

testcase.classname: Security - SQL Injection Prevention XSS prevention in inputs
testcase.name: Rejects XSS payload: javascript:alert('xss')...

testcase.classname: Security - SQL Injection Prevention Header injection prevention
testcase.name: Rejects oversized Authorization header

testcase.classname: Security - SQL Injection Prevention Header injection prevention
testcase.name: Rejects newline characters in custom headers

testcase.classname: Security - SQL Injection Prevention Body injection prevention
testcase.name: Rejects oversized JSON body

testcase.classname: Security - SQL Injection Prevention Body injection prevention
testcase.name: Rejects malformed JSON body
builds valid filter for clean codes
strips injection attempts from vendor codes
GET /api/commissions/summary returns data with valid auth
GET /api/objectives without vendedorCode returns error or empty
handles 50 concurrent health checks without errors
handles 20 concurrent API requests without crashes
memory usage stays under 500MB during test suite
getUltimasVentas uses JOIN instead of per-row queries
getUltimasVentas falls back to code when name is empty
getTopClientes uses JOIN instead of per-row queries
getDashboardVendedor runs all queries in parallel via Promise.all
getFacturaDetail runs header + lines in parallel
getFacturaDetail throws when header not found
obtenerAlbaranesConductor determines CTR inline via JOIN
obtenerProductos runs data + count in parallel
listarClientes runs data + count in parallel
obtenerAlbaran runs header + lines in parallel
obtenerAlbaran returns null when not found
getUltimasVentas with 10 results makes exactly 1 DB call
getTopClientes with 10 results makes exactly 1 DB call
returns default excluded vendors when DB is empty
returns merged list when DB has exclusions
returns false for empty admin code
returns true for vendor type ADMIN
returns commission summary for a single vendor
